author: mightypenguin
content: Is there a writeup somewhere comparing the EOF EIPs vs going to something WASM? On the surface to me it seems like a similar amount of work for both? (e.g. EIP-3670) I've not been following EOF too closely though...

author: _shemnon
content: Wasm has been tried and came up lacking, here's a devcon talk - https://archive.devcon.org/archive/watch/5/ewasm-past-present-future/?playlist=Devcon%205&tab=YouTube.

author: _shemnon
content: Ipsilon was all-in on Wasm before they were all-in on EOF.
